1037:5: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ||2||
1037:8: kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati|
1037:9: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit||4||
1037:10: svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā|
1037:15: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate||7||
1037:18: aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati|
1037:24: avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati|
1037:27: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ||13||
1037:29: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ||14||
1037:30: yena gṛṇhāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate|
1037:32: avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā|
1037:40: na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate|
1037:42: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate|
1037:43: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ||21||
1037:44: nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate|
1037:45: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate||22||
1037:48: yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit|
1037:49: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati||24||
